sources.title: Kiiroi Namida (2007)
sources.description: They famously say that all the hippies of the '60s ended up becoming nothing more than bankers. Amidst a resurgent Japan of the 1960s four young men aspire to respectively become a singer, a painter, a writer and a comic book author. They vow not to compromise until their dreams are realized. This is their story.

metadata.Plot: They famously say that all the hippies of the '60s ended up becoming nothing more than bankers. This is their story.
metadata.Actors: Kazunari Ninomiya, Masaki Aiba, Satoshi Ohno
